tests.scenario: Verify camera's water resistance up to 100m depth
steps: Given the camera is fully functional
When the camera is submerged in water at 1m depth for 10 minutes
And the depth is gradually increased to 100m in increments of 10m
Then the camera should remain functional without water ingress at every depth

tests.scenario: Verify camera durability under sudden pressure changes
steps: Given the camera is placed in water at a depth of 10m
When the depth is suddenly increased to 50m within 5 seconds
Then the camera should remain functional without water ingress or performance issues

tests.scenario: Verify camera functionality after prolonged submersion
steps: Given the camera is placed in water at a depth of 5m for 24 hours
When the camera is removed and tested
Then the camera should function normally without water damage
Given the camera is placed in saltwater at a depth of 10m for 2 hours
When the camera is rinsed with fresh water and tested
Then the camera should remain functional
And show no signs of corrosion or performance degradation

tests.scenario: Verify the camera survives a 15m vertical drop
steps: Given the camera is dropped from a 15m height onto a concrete surface
When the camera is inspected for physical damage
And the power, shutter, and mode buttons are tested
Then the camera should show no major physical damage
And all functionalities should operate normally

tests.scenario: Verify camera durability after multiple consecutive drops
steps: Given the camera is dropped from a 15m height onto a concrete surface
And the process is repeated 5 times
When the camera is inspected for physical damage
Then the camera should show no major damage
And all functionalities should operate normally

tests.scenario: Verify battery lasts 10 hours in standby mode
steps: Given the camera battery is fully charged
When the camera is left in standby mode for 10 hours
Then the camera should remain powered on after 10 hours

tests.scenario: Verify battery lasts 4 hours during continuous filming
steps: Given the camera battery is fully charged
When the camera records video continuously
Then the camera should record for at least 4 hours before shutting down

tests.scenario: Verify behavior when starting a recording with low battery
steps: Given the camera battery is at 5% charge
When the camera starts recording a video
Then the camera should display a low battery warning
And the camera should automatically save the recording before shutting down
Given the camera is off
When the power button is pressed
Then the camera should turn on
When the power button is pressed again
Then the camera should turn off
Given the camera is in photo mode
When the shutter button is pressed 50 times
Then the camera should capture 50 photos successfully
Given the camera is in video mode
When the shutter button is pressed 50 times
Then the camera should start and stop video recording successfully
Given the camera is in photo mode
When the mode switch button is pressed
Then the camera should switch to video mode
When the mode switch button is pressed again
Then the camera should switch back to photo mode

tests.scenario: Verify behavior during rapid mode switching
steps: Given the camera is powered on
When the mode switch button is pressed 10 times within 5 seconds
Then the camera should not crash or freeze
And the camera should correctly toggle between video and photo modes

tests.scenario: Verify behavior for partially pressing a button
steps: Given the camera is powered on
When the shutter button is pressed halfway
Then the camera should not perform any unintended action
And the button should require a full press to capture a photo or start video recording
